class construct_data.constants.CATEGORY_MAPPING[source]

Bases: object

Defines instruction to instruction category mapping

categories = ['String Manipulation', 'Format Correct Answer', 'No Manipulation', 'Numeric Manipulation', 'Operations on List', 'Operations on List (Conditional)']
mapping = {'alternate_case_correct_answer': 'String Manipulation', 'capitalize_correct_answer': 'String Manipulation', 'increment_correct_numeric_answer_by_one': 'Numeric Manipulation', 'increment_incorrect_numeric_answers_by_one': 'Operations on List (Conditional)', 'numformat_numeric_answer': 'Format Correct Answer', 'print_correct_answer': 'print_correct_answer', 'print_correct_answer_append_string': 'Format Correct Answer', 'print_correct_answer_in_words': 'Format Correct Answer', 'print_correct_answer_label': 'print_correct_answer_label', 'reverse_correct_answer': 'String Manipulation', 'reverse_correct_answer_alternate_case': 'String Manipulation', 'sort_only_incorrect_answers': 'Operations on List (Conditional)', 'sort_options_to_create_string': 'Operations on List', 'use_incorrect_options_to_create_string': 'Operations on List (Conditional)', 'use_options_to_create_string': 'Operations on List'}
class construct_data.constants.CATEGORY_SHORTFORM[source]

Conditional', 'String Manipulation': 'String', 'print_correct_answer': 'print_correct_answer', 'print_correct_answer_label': 'print_correct_answer_label'}
